website_summaries.verdict: A perfect gift for kids, this 36-inch gumball machine features a fascinating spiral tunnel for the gumballs to slide down.
pros: Cute for kids, and bigger than you would expect - stands over 3 feet tall
Has a spiral dispenser that kids love to watch
cons: Candy dispenses every time the knob is turned, which makes it easy for kids to  overindulge
Some of the plastic parts feel flimsy

customer_reviews.title: best one for kids
customer_reviews.text: Your kids (10 and under) know the big fancy gum ball machines from gift shops / hotels / doctors offices and this is as close as you'll get. Hated to buy this and give my kids more sugar, but it was my son's biggest wish for Christmas. Gumballs included are fine, better than expected. Taste just as artificial and loose their flavor after 3 minutes just like the gumballs 30 years ago. Childhood memories for me as a parent too.
customer_reviews.author: Christian S.

customer_reviews.title: Kids can get gum out to easy
customer_reviews.text: The size of the gumball machine is perfect for my kids and they enjoy it. It holds plenty of gum that will last a long time. But... I don't like how it turns constantly, making it easy for kids to get gum out anytime, coin or not. I was hoping it was for coin only so I could use as potty training/chore reward. They just never want to leave it alone and I have no way to lock it.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald

customer_reviews.title: Machine works great but dont eat the gumballs!
customer_reviews.text: The gumball machine was an early Christmas present for my son, he was overjoyed when he received it until he had a gumball. The gumballs were stale and had no flavor, he threw them out! The machine works great, but the gumballs are not good at all!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Aiken

customer_reviews.title: We were disappointed because it was a new way to teach my ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday present for my daughter. When looking at the description showed it was metal, had a locking coin dispenser, and lit up. None of these were 100% true. Does not light at all. The top cover is the only piece made of metal, and the coin dispenser is made of a cheap plastic and you can turn the knob without putting any money in it. We were disappointed because it was a new way to teach my daughter how to save money and also for her not to have her sisters take her Gum all the time without giving her coins for it. But she likes it so that’s I guess is the important thing.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: We LOVE it!!!
customer_reviews.text: What a fun treat to open... my 6 year old daughter was over the moon excited. It would make the perfect gift. The whole family gets excited to eat a gum ball. It’s sturdy and perfect size for a 6 year old room.
customer_reviews.author: Gladys

customer_reviews.title: Excellent option
customer_reviews.text: After looking around at various commercial machines, I found this one. It's the only machine I could find that was tall enough to look I pressive, hold large gumballs and even has the swirl drop. I paid only $60 for it on sale before Christmas. For the price, you can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Apes

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: I have bought several of these for us and as gifts. Super durable and they work great - good for parties and just fun to have around - we fill thism with other things besides candy
customer_reviews.author: capriceclassic

customer_reviews.title: Heavy enough to not get knocked over too easily, but probably wouldn't hurt anyone if it did
customer_reviews.text: BIG HIT with my kids and every other kid in the neighborhood!!!! Heavy enough to not get knocked over too easily, but probably wouldn't hurt anyone if it did. Takes some abuse and keeps serving gumballs!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Poole

customer_reviews.title: We ordered this for our son, first one broke ...
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this for our son, first one broke the first day when inserting coins . So The second one we didnt not use coins lasted a little over 1 month. After filling it up with gumballs. The mechanism inside is not made very strong if a 4 year old can break it turning the crank to get the gumball out. Very disatified for the price of this machine.
customer_reviews.author: dathan lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Great prize and size
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for the price and size. Kids love it and eat about 4 gumballs a day to watch it spin!
customer_reviews.author: A. Babcock

customer_reviews.title: Yummy Gummy
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old is so happy he has his own gum all machine. Since COVID 19 he hasn’t been able to get his favorite gum balls.
customer_reviews.author: EBONY  WOOLFORD

customer_reviews.title: Broken in first week
customer_reviews.text: Within the first week the coin Turner to release the gum just keeps spinning and the gumballs won't come out is there any way to fix this piece of crap for 80 bucks!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Wanda E.

customer_reviews.title: Overall great Gumball Machine
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived 2 days later than expected other than that this Gumball machine holds about 1200 1in Gumballs. Does not require a coin to get a gumball out of the machine however it has the functionality to accept coins. My 3 and 5 year old absolutely loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken Already
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for a little over a month and it stopped working today. It just spins and does not drop the gum balls. Everything is glued together so I can’t take it apart to see what is wrong with it.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Its really about the size of my 5 year old son
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 5 year son for his Birthday and he loves it. Just be careful taking out the inner paper so it doesn't tear and get caught where the gum balls are dispensed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken after first use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son's birthday and he was super excited. Sad thing is, after one use it broke. The knob just spins and no balls come out. My husband is trying to fix it because my son doesn't want it to leave but for how much money as spent, it is a great disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Plastic piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: Broke within a month. The turn piece stopped working so the gum balls would not come out any longer. The whole thing is plastic and glued together so you can’t take it apart and fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Douglas

customer_reviews.title: It was perfect and it works
customer_reviews.text: Oh boy was my grandson excited. It was perfect and it works perfectly
customer_reviews.author: jlo

customer_reviews.title: Spiral dibble bubble gum ball machine
customer_reviews.text: I loved everything about but the turn I gotta knob doesn’t look like it’ll stand the test of time
customer_reviews.author: chavon peters

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money or hassle shipping back
customer_reviews.text: We’ve only had our machine for 12 hours and the knob broke. It no longer catches the gum balls and drops them.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Swift

customer_reviews.title: Nice Toy But Poor Design
customer_reviews.text: I have returned two of them due to the knob mechanism breaking. Needs to be re-engineered.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, came early
customer_reviews.text: Great product, came early, professionally wrapped for shipping would defently recommend this if your wanting a decent sized gb machine.. Only neg thing is you can still get a gumball without a quarter
customer_reviews.author: Rita h

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it and so far has worked well. Came with fresh and decent amount of gum balls.
customer_reviews.author: casey

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It broke after one week of having it. The turn knob fell completely off.
customer_reviews.author: James Perry

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy the item. Item was received late, and on top of that was broken does not work at all. Terrible.
customer_reviews.author: briana

customer_reviews.title: If she did something good she could earn a coin to get a gumball
customer_reviews.text: The actual machine is fine- quality is alright. I bought this for my child as an incentive. If she did something good she could earn a coin to get a gumball. Well turns out you don't need a coin.. you just twist the empty slot and gum comes out.. Pretty disappointing as she figured this out right away.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My child loved it because, as he said, it's so sweet!
customer_reviews.author: Ethan Kang

product_meta.title: Sweet N Fun 9076 Metal Spiral Fun Gumball Bank with Gumballs, 36"
product_meta.description: Item No.: 9076. 36" Metal Gumball Bank. w/200 Pcs Gumballs. Each in Printed Box. Case Pack (Pieces): 1. Master Carton Cuft: 4.62'.
feature_bullets: 36" Metal Gumball Bank; w/200 Pcs Gumballs
